r.d: The Console_Getargs package implements a Command Line arguments and parameters parser for your CLI applications. It performs some basic arguments validation and automatically creates a formatted help text, based on the given configuration.
r.n: Fix for bug #8643: Providing strings as min/max values gives weird results (Benjamin Bittner) Fix for bug #8770: incorrect path to class resource in example2 (Laurent Laville) Implement request #8771: Improve help-usage output render with optional indentation (Laurent Laville) Implement request #8771: Improve col1 arguments alignment (Laurent Laville)
